content: Hi, who's attending the San Diego Connectathon?
I'll be there and happy to help out, but won't be bringing any systems.

I'm expecting a list of Transcelerate attendees next week -- expect ~8 or more. Also Oracle and Accenture are sending reps, and some smaller companies (Protocol First, Clinithink, PatientLink). Possibly more. Expecting to fill 2 tables this time. @Sam Hume is working on it too.

There are a number of teeming FHIR for Biopharma Clinical Research activities now going on, and they need some input from a FHIR expert who can answer mapping and technical questions on their calls (every other Thursday, 10:00-11:00 EDT). Anyone out there willing to help? (Sam and Geoff are already participating)
I can do that. Is that every other Thursday starting today or next week?
Excellent. I believe next call will be July 27. I'll send you an email with an introduction.
I will be there too. I can help integrate Security and Privacy into your scenario. - http://build.fhir.org/secpriv-module.html
Would be great to have you there as a security & privacy expert, John. Lots of things to explore there.

I am working with a few projects to build up a catalog of patterns. There is no single solution, but there should be a catalog of patterns that cover a significant amount of the necessary space. However these are not available, and need pulling programs to cause them to be created. Teamwork and experimentation
